structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
SHERIFFS, CONSTABLES, AND COUNTY POLICE FORCE

law.catch_line: Money collected by sheriff -- Demand for.
law.text: A person entitled to money collected by a sheriff may demand it from the sheriff, by himself, his attorney, or any other person having his written authority.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4576.
